outputs.output_descr: The project aims at contributing to the development of the participatory democracy by informing and motivating the young aged between 16-29 years old, who are marginalized by the society either due to the extreme poverty they and their families are facing, or due to the school dropout or certain disabilities, etc. The aim is to be attained by providing the young of the target group with impartial, systemized and updated information concerning the human rights and the obligations as citizens, the importance of involvement in the political and social life, the importance of the legislative process and active participation, contributing thus to the continuation of the democratic traditions by cultivating and involving the marginalized youth as well as other NGOs in this democratic action.

project_descr: UNDEF Project "I'm young, I get involved, therefore I count" supporting the development of the participatory democracy
project_title: I'm young, I get involved, therefore I count
